extension.name: System - OSE Drag n Drop Admin
extension.author: Open Source Excellence
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) 2009 Open Source Excellence. All rights reserved.
extension.description: Adds a functionality to let you re-order your table items by dragging and dropping rows and pressing the save button. Now works for Joomla 2.5!! Remember to publish the plugin in your plugins administration area!

field.name: table_class
field.label: Table Class
field.description: Enter the table class you would like to apply the drag n drop features. This allows for specific table enabling. Default: adminlist

field.name: include_components
field.label: Include Component List
field.description: Enter the component names (comma seperated) where you would like to enable the DnD Plugin. For example: com_kupo,com_comprofiler,com_virtuemart,

field.name: oddrow
field.label: Odd Row Text Color
field.description: Enter the color in pixels of your odd row table text.

field.name: evenrow
field.label: Even Row Text Color
field.description: Enter the color in pixels of your even row table text.

field.name: use_jquery
field.label: Use Included jQuery
field.description: Choose whether to use the included jQuery. Disable if your site admin is allready using jQuery. Default is Yes as most Joomla Admin areas do not use jQuery.

field.name: show_arrows
field.label: Show Reorder Arrows
field.description: Choose whether to show or hide the reorder arrows. Arrows are not required if using this plugin, but you might want them anyway.
